changeSet.author: WeiChen
changeSet.sql: create table treatment_procedure_del ( id bigint not null constraint pk_treatment_procedure_del primary key, status varchar(255) not null, quantity integer, total double precision, note varchar(5100), completed_date timestamp, price double precision, nhi_category varchar(255), nhi_description varchar(5100), nhi_procedure_id bigint, treatment_task_id bigint, procedure_id bigint, appointment_id bigint, disposal_id bigint, doctor_user_id bigint, created_by varchar(50) not null, created_date timestamp not null, last_modified_by varchar(50), last_modified_date timestamp, nhi_icd_10_cm varchar(255), ic_card_eject boolean );
